Text: So far you aren't seeding FuCtUpPuNk. I have Super Seeding on, but it's pointless unless I can get this.
im seeding but it takes a while to detect the peers sometimes because i seed all my low seeded torrents at 1kb too. don't worry though i upload around 250-500kb. the lowest is 250kb
Just tried it. Doesn't work properly, clearly a colour issue. I tried this on Windows 7 Ultimate 32bit. Either way i'll share till ther's 10 in Seed Swarm.

if u have an ati card, that's prolly why. im on win 7 64bit. 9gb ram, 1tb hd, nvidia geforce gtx 260 1.5gb vid ram, intel i7core cpu 920. so i'm pretty sure it's not a win 7 thing or a nvidia thing :)

might try using the compatibility options on the shortcut, tamper with those n im sure you'll get it looking perfectly.

To fix the colour problem, open Control Panel and select Adjust Screen Resolution. Don't change anything, but just having the window open will fix the colour. 
Don't ask me how or why, but it works on many older games that suffer this issue!
